blueprint.description: Keybase (a secure messaging and file-sharing tool) on nearly any platform
blueprint.overview: [Keybase](https://keybase.io/) is secure messaging and file-sharing. Keybase uses public key cryptography to ensure your messages stay private. Keybase works for families, roommates, clubs, and groups of friends. Keybase connects to public identities, too. You can connect with communities from Twitter, Reddit, and elsewhere.
blueprint.name: Keybase
blueprint.title: Keybase
